JobFullDesc: Facebook is looking for an Art Director to join Visual Systems — a team focused on creating and driving best-in-class visual concepts, strategies and prototypes for teams across Facebook app. This person will be responsible for contributing to the overall design process through concept, design development, and delivery of compelling visuals that will resonate with internal stakeholders and our external global audience. The ideal candidate is a detail-oriented systems thinker and visual designer with a concept-driven approach who understands how form influences function, and is constantly striving for simplicity. The ideal candidate has a strong strategic approach to their work with an exceptional eye for detail, design, and standard for quality. This person is an expert in their craft and is highly skilled in working with both internal and external partners.
